item.title: What the hell is mindcraft?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:379200”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=474912.msg3473842#msg3473842 date=1295505292]

how can you hut trees down with your hands?!? its weird…

Because it is NOT realistic

its not!?! OMG!! and i thought the world actully looked like that… man am i stupid or what luckly i didnt try cutting a tree down bare handed before i read this… that wouldnt of been too pretty lol

Your a fucking retard.

It’s a video game, just like most things. Let’s compare it to Grand Theft Auto. How often does someone go around shooting people stealing cars shooting cops and get away with it? Uhh… Never. Your sarcasm pisses me off.

waita rage dude… i was making a joke… L2laugh!! god some people have no sense of humour…
[/quote]

Amy, your a fucking retard, L2read

[quote author=Spades link=topic=474912.msg3473791#msg3473791 date=1295498712]

Your a fucking retard.
It’s a video game, just like most things. Let’s compare it to Grand Theft Auto. How often does someone go around shooting people stealing cars shooting cops and get away with it? Uhh… Never. Your sarcasm pisses me off.
[/quote][/quote]

nope i read it… but he still needs to learn hwo to take a joke and laugh once and awhile… people are so serious about games
